content:
Can you please provide a table with the following list categorized as either animals or plants?
| Category | Name   |
|----------|--------|
| Animal   | Camel  |
| Plant    | Daisy  |
| Animal   | Horse  |
| Plant    | Rose   |

Certainly! Here is the table with the given list categorized as either animals or plants:
